SummaryEnglish:
In the mid-21st century, mankind has begun the exploration of space, and one company, Planet Catcher Corporation, has pioneered capturing asteroids and comets to mine the resources within them for use on Earth. On one such asteroid, Tortatis, lives 12-year-old Nanbu Ushiwaka - the only child ever to be born in space and survive.

But survival itself is no longer guaranteed - a military satellite triggers a disaster during a operation to capture Halley's Comet, and Ushiwaka and his fellow colonists must find a way to survive when both their country and their company abandon them. Can they escape before the nuclear reactor on the asteroid melts down? Or are they doomed to die as they lived, among the stars?

(Source: AniDB)

1.SummaryEnglish: The time is the future, the place is space. An asteroid was fixed at one of the Lagrangian points. Its name is Totatis. Ushiwaka, a child living there, was eager to obtain a licence to pilot a small vehicle in order to earn his place among the adults working as a prospector. At the same time, the second huge project in the history of Totalis is underway...

2.SummaryEnglish: After an accident during the final phase of the Halley capture programme, Totatis suffered damage and began a collision trajectory towards Earth. Probability of collision, 82%. At the moment of the accident, Ushiwaka was in the middle of his workboat piloting licence examination. Meanwhile, an ultimatum from Earth arrives at the Totalis control room. No rescue shuttle can be sent out due to the threat of a secondary disaster. Escape within a few hours...
